summary: The Fairness in Veterans' Education Act (H.R. 1872) aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code to ensure the Secretary of Veterans Affairs repays members of the Armed Forces for contributions made towards Post-9/11 Educational Assistance. The bill, introduced in the House of Representatives on March 5, 2025, by Mr. Jackson of Texas, seeks to adjust Section 3327(f)(3) of the code and specifies an effective date of August 1, 2025, for the amendment.
